head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CLARK, SYLVIA K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CLARK, SYLVIA K.

block.p: CLARK-Sylvia K. Of Hillsdale, New Jersey, on August 8, 2000. Survived by her children Merri & husband Carlos, Suzanne, Loren, and stepdaughter Kay. A woman of intelligence and determination who lived her life surrounded by family and friends, and is now reunited with beloved first-born son Lee, husband Lawrence J. Clark, and parents Vera and Jerome Klarsfeld.
